body:
Comment 1: 
There is no support for symbolic links on windows. You are first to complain :-)

I am not keen implementing it myself, unless it is really really simple. I have never
used symlinks myself. For what you are asking, we could add support for os.ModeSymlink
in os.FileInfo. But it is not the end of the story, is it? What exactly do you need?

jp created symlink support implementation http://golang.org/cl/4984050/ a while
ago, but I rejected it, because no one was using it. It is out of date now. Feel free to
propose whatever changes you need yourself.

Alex
_Labels changed: added **os-windows**, **packagebug**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
